name: Wigglytuff
description: It has a very fine fur. Take care not to make it angry, or it may inflate steadily and hit with a Body Slam.

attacks.name: Double Slap
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 40 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Expand
attacks.effect: During your opponent’s next turn, any damage done to Wigglytuff by attacks is reduced by 10 (after applying Weakness and Resistance).
